biography.bio: Pierre-François Martin-Laval was born on June 25, 1968 in Marseille, Bouches-du-Rhône, France. He is known for his work on Essaye-moi (2006), Les profs 2 (2015) and Les profs (2013).
biography.name: Pierre-François Martin-Laval

biography.bio: Julie Depardieu was born on June 18, 1973 in Paris, France as Julie Marion Depardieu. She is an actress, known for A Very Long Engagement (2004), Blame it on Fidel (2006) and Female Agents (2008).
biography.name: Julie Depardieu

biography.bio: Certainly one of France's supreme farceurs in the classic tradition, comedian Pierre Richard was born to an uppercrust family with an embarrassing riches of middle names as he was christened Pierre Richard Maurice Charles Leopold Defays. Working and building up his trade at the Paris Music Hall in the early years, he appeared in small movie roles thoughout most of the 60s. In the 70s, however, he aimed his genius directly towards film and succeeded beyond the wildest expectations. Directing and co-writing many of his slapstick vehicles, his characters often have taken on an hilariously guileless persona and, coupled with his innate gift for klutzy physical comedy, have become an audience favorite for nearly four decades. His superior work in The Daydreamer (1970) and The Troubles of Alfred (1972) was immediately recognized and this led to the international crossover hit The Tall Blond Man with One Black Shoe (1973) in which Richard played a naive, innocent concert musician plucked by chance to become a superspy on a top secret mission. A potent association in the 1960s and 1970s with actor/producer/director Yves Robert and the 1980s with writer/director Francis Veber and actor Gerard Depardieu produced several comedy classics: Alexander (1967), The Return of the Tall Blond Man with One Black Shoe (1974), The Goat (1981), Les Comperes (1983) and The Fugitives (1986). Many of Richard's classic comedies, including The Toy (1976), have spawned Hollywood remakes and imitations, though most pale compared to the originals.
biography.name: Pierre Richard

biography.bio: Kad Merad was born on March 27, 1964 in Sidi Bel Abbes, Algeria as Kaddour Merad. He is an actor and writer, known for Bienvenue chez les Ch'tis (2008), The Chorus (2004) and L'immortel (2010).
biography.name: Kad Merad

biography.bio: Isabelle Nanty was born on January 21, 1962 in Verdun, Meuse, France as Isabelle Marie-Josée Nanty. She is an actress and writer, known for Amélie (2001), Les visiteurs (1993) and Not on the Lips (2003).
biography.name: Isabelle Nanty

biography.bio: Marina Foïs was born on January 21, 1970 in Boulogne-Billancourt, Hauts-de-Seine, France. She is known for her work on Polisse (2011), RRRrrrr!!! (2004) and L'immortel (2010).
biography.name: Marina Foïs

biography.bio: Jules-Angelo Bigarnet was born on December 13, 1993. He is an actor, known for Malabar Princess (2004), Comme ton père (2007) and Le manie-Tout (2005).
biography.name: Jules-Angelo Bigarnet

biography.bio: Wladimir Yordanoff is an actor, known for L'auberge espagnole (2002), The Taste of Others (2000) and Prête-moi ta main (2006).
biography.name: Wladimir Yordanoff

biography.bio: Frédéric Proust is a writer and actor, known for H (1998), Essaye-moi (2006) and 12 ans d'âge (2013).
biography.name: Frédéric Proust

biography.bio: Arnaud Marciszewer was born on June 26, 1992. He is an actor, known for Essaye-moi (2006), Nicolas au pays des âmes (2004) and La maison de Nina (2005).
biography.name: Arnaud Marciszewer

biography.bio: Tilly Mandelbrot was born on June 1, 1994 in Paris, France. She is an actress, known for Persepolis (2007), Le bison (et sa voisine Dorine) (2003) and Essaye-moi (2006).
biography.name: Tilly Mandelbrot

biography.bio: Pascal Vincent is known for his work on Monsieur Ibrahim (2003), RRRrrrr!!! (2004) and Asterix and Obelix Meet Cleopatra (2002).
biography.name: Pascal Vincent

biography.bio: Denise Bonal was born in 1921 in Algeria, France. She was an actress, known for Essaye-moi (2006), Aux petits bonheurs (1994) and Trente ans ou La vie d'un joueur (1975). She died on April 25, 2011 in France.
biography.name: Denise Bonal

biography.bio: Valérie Bonneton was born on April 5, 1970 in Somain, Nord, France. She is an actress, known for Fais pas ci, fais pas ça (2007), Les petits mouchoirs (2010) and Summer Hours (2008).
biography.name: Valérie Bonneton

biography.bio: Robert Assolen is an actor, known for Essaye-moi (2006), Les collègues (1999) and Chez Gino (2011).
biography.name: Robert Assolen

awards.award: Alpe d'Huez International Comedy Film Festival 2006
